sentence.Network_en: Moonlight was frosting the dew, and an old sundial threw a long shadow.
sentence.Network_cn: 月光把露水照得雪白, 一座旧日规投出一条长长的影子.

sentence.Network_en: She smiled and winked as I bit into the moist chocolate frosting.
sentence.Network_cn: 她微笑着,向我眨眨眼,而我正在吃湿乎乎的巧克力糖衣.

sentence.Network_en: They stand on the top layer of butter cream frosting.
sentence.Network_cn: 就是站在这奶油蛋糕顶层的这一对儿.

entry.def: Frosting is a sweet substance made from powdered sugar that is used to cover and decorate cakes.

example.ex: ...a huge pastry with green frosting on it.
example.tran: 撒有绿色糖霜的一大块油酥糕点

means.word_mean: 1. a flavored sugar topping used to coat and decorate cakes
